name: All your soul are belong to us
name_original: All your soul are belong to us
description:
As the son of the Devil, you have to learn the ropes of the family business.

Talk to your dad if you need some guidance. Also, everyone has something to say!

Sumission for MiniJam 69 - Hell

Limitation: "Cards must be a mechanic"

Look out for a guy named Cards, he must be a mechanic!

Objective: 

Convert all the souls to ensure a steady flow of damnation!

Desktop controls:

  • X to confirm dialogs, turn souls and smash things
  • Z to talk to anyone
